Question: Seoul National University R&DB Foundation CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Seoul National University R&DB Foundation

CES 2024

- Seoul National University will participate in CES 2022 with 10 prospective unicorns, showcasing innovative technologies including AI, healthcare, and robots.
- The university's exhibition hall will feature startups using university technology and invested by Seoul National University Technology Holdings.
- Participating companies include Supertone Co., Ltd., ClariPi Co., Ltd., Ouar Lab Co., Ltd., Baz Biomedic Co., Ltd., EMOCOG Co., Ltd., Gwanak Analog Co., Ltd., DyRos, aweXome Ray Co., Ltd., Ion Medical Co., Ltd., and GymT Co., Ltd.
- The university will support participating companies by dispatching a 'Student Supporters Team' to nurture global entrepreneurial talents.
- Vice President Haecheon Choi emphasized the participation as a means to promote the morale of SNU startups and inform the world of their research and technology excellence.
Summary_cn:
首尔国立大学研发基金会

CES 2024

- 首尔国立大学将携10家潜力独角兽参加CES 2022展会，展示包括人工智能、医疗保健和机器人技术在内的创新技术。
- 大学的展馆将展示使用大学技术并由首尔国立大学技术控股公司投资的初创企业。
- 参展公司包括Supertone有限公司、ClariPi有限公司、Ouar Lab有限公司、Baz Biomedic有限公司、EMOCOG有限公司、Gwanak Analog有限公司、DyRos、aweXome Ray有限公司、Ion Medical有限公司和GymT有限公司。
- 大学将通过派遣“学生支持团队”来支持参展公司，培养全球创业人才。
- 副校长崔海春强调参展是提高首尔国立大学初创企业士气并向世界展示研究和技术卓越性的途径。
